REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3323 reute d f BC-VIDEO-SHOPPING-MALL-E 03-16 0044

TEXT.TITLE: VIDEO SHOPPING MALL EXPANDS VIEWERS BASE
TEXT.BODY: <Video Shopping Mall Inc> said it signed agreements to increase its programming by four additional stations, adding 3.04 mln viewers. It said its programs now reach 24.8 mln households. Reuter
